title: Nigeria says it suspended Twitter "indefinitely" after platform deletes president's tweet
content:
1. Nigeria says it suspended Twitter "indefinitely" after platform deletes president's tweet  CBS News
  2. Twitter Shuttered in Nigeria After Removing President's Post  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Twitter declares access to its platform a 'human right' amid censorship of conservatives  Fox News
  4. Nigeria suspends Twitter: Twitter indefinitely shutdown in Nigeria  WION
  5. Nigerians can now be prosecuted for sending tweets following ban on Twitter  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ナイジェリア、大統領のツイートを削除したTwitterを「無期限に」停止したと発表
尼日利亚称在平台删除总统的推文后 "无限期 "暂停推特业务
尼日利亞稱在平臺刪除總統的推文後 "無限期 "暫停推特業務
